name: Scheduled Task - Generate and Upload VersaPay Reconciliation File
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: scheduled_event
code.description: Trigger every 1 days at 01:00:00 AM

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_every
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger every
extended_input_schema.hint:
Define repeating schedule. Enter whole numbers only.
                        This field can be set to a minimum of 5 minutes.

extended_input_schema.name: trigger_at
extended_input_schema.label: Trigger at
extended_input_schema.hint: Set a time to schedule the job.

extended_input_schema.name: start_after
extended_input_schema.label: Start after
extended_input_schema.hint: Set date and time to start or leave blank to start immediately. Once recipe has been run or tested, value cannot be changed.

extended_input_schema.name: timezone
extended_input_schema.label: Timezone
extended_input_schema.hint: Select the timezone to use. Leave it blank to use (GMT-08:00) Pacific Time (US & Canada)

input.name: invoices_and_credits
input.list_item_schema_json: [{"control_type":"text","label":"Reconciliation Invoice Number","name":"reconciliation_invoice_number","type":"string","optional":false,"hint":"invoice or credit memo number (NX89891 or CM5347)"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Balance","name":"balance","type":"string","optional":false,"hint":"positive value for invoices, negative value for credit memos"},{"control_type":"text","label":"Division","name":"division","type":"string","optional":false,"hint":"subsidiary internal id"}]

properties.label: Reconciliation Invoice Number
properties.name: reconciliation_invoice_number
properties.hint: invoice or credit memo number (NX89891 or CM5347)

properties.label: Balance
properties.name: balance
properties.hint: positive value for invoices, negative value for credit memos
